vyākhyā
nāma rūpa ātmakam viśvam yasya līlāyitam vapuḥ
prakāśāya namaḥ tasmai sa vimarśāya śaṃbhave
iha paramaśivaḥ eva
sakala bhū maṇḍala uttare śrīmat śāradā divya krīḍā sadane
śrī kāśmīra deśe śrī narasiṃhaguptanāthaḥ iti prakhyāta abhidhānaḥ
śrīmat utpaladeva ācārya mukha udgītam śrīmat īśvarapratyabhijñā ākhyam
śāstram vyācikhyāsuḥ sva vyākhyānasya niṣpratyūha paripūraṇāya
tad śāstra sāra bhūtām parām devatām samāviśya ā
nu grāhya jana samāveśa artham stuti parāmarśa pūrvam abhimukhīkaroti
nirāśaṃsāt ityādinā yat aham iti pūrṇāt nirāśaṃsāt unmeṣa
purā addhi śākhām ābhā sayati tadanu tām eva vibhaṅktum āśāste cā
tat parama śiva śakti ātma nikhilam advaitam bande iti anvayaḥ yat kila
śrī triṃśikāśāstre

original: anuttaraṃ kathaṃ deva sadyaḥ kaulika siddhidam |
analyzed: anuttaram katham deva sadyas kaulika siddhi dam
yena vijñāta mātreṇa khecarī sama tām vrajet
etat guhyam mahā guptam kathayasva mama prabho

analyzed: hṛdaye sā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulikī kula nāyikā

śṛṇu devi mahābhāge uttarasya api anuttaram

original: ityādinā sarvatantreṣu sarvadā ityantena granthena prativacanamarpayatā

original: | evaṃ vidhepaci bhāvasya ghaṭāderbhāvāntareṇa bhūtalena saha ca
analyzed: evam bhāvasya ghaṭa ādeḥ bhāva antareṇa bhū talena saha ca

original: ādhāryādhāra bhāvarūpa saṃbandhaḥ sa eva bhāva tadabhāvayoriti
analyzed: ādhārya ādhāra bhāva rūpa saṃbandhaḥ saḥ eva bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ iti

śiva ādeḥ ca ubhayoḥ api ādhārya ādhāra bhāvaḥ tatas ca iti eva

original: vā tasya darśane āloka puñjādikaṃ vā yaccākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tadeva

original: śilādikaṃ bhūtale ghaṭā bhāva iti kriyā parāmarśā bhāvena vā
analyzed: śilā ādikam bhū tale ghaṭāḥ bhāvaḥ iti kriyā parāmarśā bhāvena vā

original: bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyabhāva kriyāparāmarśa sadbhāvena vā
analyzed: bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti abhāva kriyā parāmarśa sadbhāvena vā

original: vyavahriyate | yatra bhūtale netranimīlane santamasādau sati cakṣurvyāpāro
analyzed: vyavahriyate yatra bhū tale netra nimīlane santamasa ādau sati

original: nāsti tatrāpi cakṣurvyāpāra gocare bhūtale ghaṭo cita kaṭhina sparśa
analyzed: na asti tatra api cakṣuḥ vyāpāra gocare bhū tale

original: vinābhūtaṃ mṛdūṣṇādisparśaṃ gṛhṇan taṃ sparśameva ghaṭābhāva
analyzed: vinābhūtam mṛdu uṣṇa ādi sparśam gṛhṇan tam sparśam eva ghaṭa abhāva

original: iti vyavaharati | sarvagasyeti | sarvadeśakālagatasya vāyusparśasya tatra
analyzed: iti vyavaharati sarvagasya iti sarva deśa kāla gatasya vāyu sparśasya tatra

original: kintvitye tat svamato pakṣepāyeti svasiddhānta sthāpanāya svapratibhāṃ

original: prativaktīkṛtya tayā saha sūtrakarasya kiṃ punaratra nyāyyamiti
analyzed: prativaktīkṛtya tayā saha sūtrakarasya kim punar atra nyāyyam iti

original: padasyārthaḥ | tatreti | evaṃ bhūte praśnaparāmarśe svayamevāha - tatreti

original: tasyālokasparśādeḥsvena rūpeṇeti tadeka grāhakeṇa ayamālokaḥ ayaṃ
analyzed: tasya āloka sparśa ādeḥ svena rūpeṇa iti tad eka grāhakeṇa ayam ālokaḥ ayam

original: sparśa ityādirūpaṃ jñānaṃ yattajjñānaṃ kartṛbhūtvā tasyālokādeḥ
analyzed: sparśaḥ ityādi rūpam jñānam yat tat jñānam kartṛ bhūtvā tasya āloka ādeḥ

original: aghaṭarūpatāṃ ghaṭābhāva rūpatām | tatra bhūtale sādhayatīti śilādi
analyzed: aghaṭa rūpatām ghaṭa abhāva rūpatām tatra bhū tale sādhayati iti śilā ādi
jñānam eva śilā ādeḥ ghaṭa ādi abhāva rūpatām sādhayati iti arthaḥ

evam śilā ādi āloka ādi abhāvaḥ eva ghaṭa ādi bhāvaḥ iti uktvā
śabda rasa ādeḥ abhāvaḥ api tad anya śabda rasa ādeḥ bhāvaḥ eva iti vaktum āha

original: ucchvāsa niśvāsātmaka bahiḥ spandaḥ parispanda vyatiriktāntara
analyzed: ucchvāsa niśvāsa ātmaka bahis spandaḥ parispanda vyatirikta antara
sāmagrī sākalyam iti śrotra indriyasya śabda grahaṇa sāmagrī sākalyam asti iti
saṃbhāvayamānaḥ tam eva antaram śabdam śrāvaṇa rūpa eka jñāna

original: saṃsargiṇaṃ gṛhṇan tadanyaṃ bāhyaṃ śabdaṃ niṣedhayati | tatrāntara
analyzed: saṃsargiṇam gṛhṇan tad anyam bāhyam śabdam niṣedhayati tatra antara
eva śabdaḥ asti na bāhyaḥ iti tadā antara sūkṣma śabda abhāvam adhi

original: sūkṣmāntaṃ nādopahita śrotrasūkṣmatamaḥ śabda evāsti sūkṣmaḥ
analyzed: sūkṣma antam nāda upahita śrotra sūkṣmatamaḥ śabdaḥ eva asti sūkṣmaḥ

original: śabdo nāstītyabhavaṃ vedayate | evaṃ rasāntarā bhāvāt tattadbāhya
analyzed: śabdaḥ na asti iti abhavam vedayate evam rasa antarāḥ bhāvāt tad tad bāhya
śabda ādi abhāva grahaṇa samaye tadānīm eva svakīya śabdāt eva
vastu antarā sparśinā api svakīyam danta udaka rasam anubhavan danta udaka rasa

original: evāsti nānya iti vedayate | evaṃ rasāntarābhāvamapi svakīyaṃ
analyzed: eva asti na anyaḥ iti vedayate evam rasa antara abhāvam api svakīyam

original: trijpuṭitabhāvaṃ jighrat svakīya tripuṭikāgandha evāsti nānya iti vedayate |
analyzed: jighrat trij puṭita bhāvam jighrat tri puṭikā gandhaḥ eva asti na anyaḥ iti vedayate

original: evaṃ svakīya kāyīya sparśaṃ sa eva dadhat sparśāntaraṃ nāstīti
analyzed: evam svakīya kāyīya sparśam saḥ eva dadhat sparśa antaram na asti iti
vedayate ekaiḥ śrauta ādi
jñāna saṃsarga yogya śabda ādi vastu antara upalaṃbhena
śabda ādi upalabdhi kāraṇasya
śrauta ādi karaṇa vargasya tad itara śabda ādi abhāva
niścayaḥ na asti iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tasmāt ekaika śabda ādikam gṛhītvā
śabda ādi vastu antarasya abhāvaḥ vaktum śakyaḥ iti arthaḥ
śabda ādi viṣaya anubhavena asti iti kalpitasya
śrotra ādi karaṇa vargasya tadā eva dhvaṃsa nāśam
kalya niścayaḥ asti eva
tad tad vācya śabda ādi abhāva grahaṇa samaye svakīye asya śabda aṃśe
svakīya śrotra ādi indriya rūpa eka bhūḥ kim iti ced etat pariharati na iti
tad tad śabda ādi abhāva upalipsuḥ hi prayatnena tad tad śabda ādi
hetu bhūtam tat tat śrotra ādi indriya adhiṣṭhānam vyāpārayan eva lakṣyate

original: (265) nanviti | na kevalaṃ śrotrādīndriya viṣayasya śabdādereva
analyzed: nanu iti na kevalam śrotra ādi indriya viṣayasya śabda ādeḥ eva
vyatirekeṇa niṣedham vyavahāraḥ prāptaḥ yāvat adṛśyasya api

original: piśācādervyatirekeṇāpi niṣedhavyavahāraḥ prāpnoti | kathamiti cet | sa
analyzed: piśāca ādeḥ vyatirekeṇa api niṣedha vyavahāraḥ prāpnoti katham iti ced sa

original: bhūtalagata āloka puñjo yathā ghaṭādanyastadvat piśācāderapyanya iti
analyzed: bhū tala gataḥ āloka puñjaḥ yathā ghaṭāt anyaḥ tadvat piśāca ādeḥ api anyaḥ iti

original: tamāloka puñjaṃ gṛhītvātra bhūtale piśāco nāstīti vaktuṃ
analyzed: tam āloka puñjam gṛhītvā atra bhū tale piśācaḥ na asti iti vaktum
yuktam iti āśaṃkya āha piśācaḥ syāt ityādi anālokaḥ ālokāt anyaḥ api

original: piśācaḥ indriyagocaratvādadṛśyo bhūtvā bhūtalāntare bhātīti syāt,
analyzed: piśācaḥ indriya gocara tvāt adṛśyaḥ bhūtvā bhū tala antare bhāti iti syāt

original: saṃbhāvyate tadvadālokasyāntare so'stīti saṃbhāvyata eva sapiśācaḥ
analyzed: saṃbhāvyate tadvat ālokasya antare saḥ asti iti saṃbhāvyate eva sa piśācaḥ

original: adṛśyo bhūtvā bhūtalasyāntarvartamānatvādatra piśāco nāstīti yathā
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ bhūtvā bhū talasya antar vartamāna tvāt atra piśācaḥ na asti iti yathā

original: evaṃ sarvatheti | bhūtalaṃ na ghaṭa ityādi tādātmya bhāva vyavahāraḥ
analyzed: evam sarvathā iti bhū talam na ghaṭa ityādi tādātmya bhāva vyavahāraḥ

original: sarvatra yathā svataḥ siddhastadvat piśācāderapīti bhavaduktanītyā
analyzed: sarvatra yathā svatas siddhaḥ tadvat piśāca ādeḥ api iti bhavat ukta nītyā

original: ālokapuṃjo yadyapi piśācādvyatiriktastathā yadyapi apiśācātmā āloko
analyzed: āloka puñjaḥ yadi api piśācāt vyatiriktaḥ tathā yadi api a piśāca ātmā
sidhyati atra tathā api atra āloka madhye
piśācaḥ na asti iti etat aśakya madhyavasitum ghaṭaḥ hi āloka pūra madhye

original: piśāca vadadṛśyo na saṃbhāvyaḥ | kathamiti cet ghaṭe vidyamāne tatra
analyzed: piśāca vat adṛśyaḥ na saṃbhāvyaḥ katham iti ced ghaṭe vidyamāne tatra
ghaṭa dhiṣṭhite bhū tale tad bhū tala gata āloka pūra apasarpaṇāt atas ca iti
āloka pūra madhye ghaṭasya asaṃbhāvya tvāt atra āloka pūra madhye
ghaṭaḥ na asti iti

original: p. 206) siddhyatīdaṃyaḥ piśācastu bhūtalamadhya ālokamadhye'pi vā
analyzed: piśācaḥ tu bhū tala madhye āloka madhye api vā
bhavan ghaṭavat tām āloka pūra nibiḍitā na pratihanti

original: satādṛgvidhasvabhāva iti yataḥ tataśceti tanniviḍitā pratihananā
analyzed: sa tādṛgvidha svabhāvaḥ iti yatas tatas ca iti tad nibiḍitā pratihananā

original: bhāvādālokamadhye tasya piśācasyā saṃbhāvanādatra piśāco nāstīti
analyzed: bhāvāt āloka madhye tasya piśācasya saṃbhāvanāt atra piśācaḥ na asti iti

original: kathaṃ vyatirekeṇa niṣedha vyavahāraḥ | evaṃ cakṣurindriyaviṣayabhūta
analyzed: katham vyatirekeṇa niṣedha vyavahāraḥ evam
dugdha ādi gata rūpa madhye rasana indriya viṣayasya rasa ādeḥ
saṃbhāvanāt rūpe rasa gandha ādiḥ na asti iti vyatirekeṇa niṣedhaḥ

evam tātparyam uktvā padaśas vyākhyāti yadi api ityādi
tadvat ālokasya api abhyantara īsaḥ asti iti saṃbhāvyate iti etad antam
sūtra yojanām eva vyākhyātam tatas ca iti āloka abhyantare api piśācasya
saṃbhāvanāt ālokaḥ piśācāt anyaḥ iti anena tādātmya rūpeṇa yathā

original: niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi sarvaprakāreṇeti atrapiśāconāstīti rekeṇāpi
analyzed: niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathā api sarva prakāreṇa iti rekeṇa api

original: na niṣiddha iti piśācādyabhāvaniviḍa vāsanā vyavahārāḥ tatra bhūtale
analyzed: na niṣiddhaḥ iti piśāca ādi abhāva nibiḍa vāsanā vyavahārāḥ tatra bhū tale

original: evaṃ bādhya bādhakabhāva vyavahāra prasaṃgāt kiṃ

analyzed: daśāyām na tena ghaṭa jñānena gṛhītasya ghaṭasya kiṃcid āyātam

original: tadvādhāyāṃ prasaṅge'pi nāyātaḥ | evamiti | tathā śuktikā jñānaṃ
analyzed: tad vādhāyām prasaṅge api na āyātaḥ evam iti tathā śuktikā jñānam

analyzed: rūpya jñānam na bhavati iti yat na ghaṭa jñānam

original: prāmāṇyaṃ saṃvit iyaveti ghaṭajñānena paṭābhāvajñānena ca
analyzed: prāmāṇyam saṃvid iyavā iti ghaṭa jñānena paṭa abhāva jñānena ca

original: pūrvaṃ pra---------------------- bhavati | ayaṃ ghaṭa iti ayaṃ
analyzed: pūrvam pra bhavati ayam ghaṭaḥ iti ayam

original: p. 207) (267) cetyeṣā sarvā ghaṭajñāna svarūpa cintā | anayā
analyzed: ca iti eṣā sarvā ghaṭa jñāna svarūpa cintā anayā

original: pūrvapravṛttasya paṭa jñānasya kiṃ jātaṃ na kimapītyarthaḥ | evaṃ
analyzed: pūrva pravṛttasya paṭa jñānasya kim jātam na kim api iti arthaḥ evam

original: śuktiriyamiti na rajatamiti ----------- krameṇāhaṃ śuktau pramāṇam | ahaṃ
analyzed: śuktiḥ iyam iti na rajatam iti krameṇa aham śuktau pramāṇam aham

analyzed: tāvatā iti tajjñāna dvaya mātreṇa bhūta pūrvasya rajata jñānasya na

original: kiñcidapi bādhanaṃ pravṛttamiti tatprāktana rajatajñāna viṣayī kṛtaṃ
analyzed: kiñcid api bādhanam pravṛttam iti tat prāktana rajata jñāna viṣayī kṛtam

original: rajataṃ kathaṃ satyaṃ syāt | jñātrāvinā jñānānāmeva
analyzed: rajatam katham satyam syāt jñātrā a vinā jñānānām eva
bādhya bādhaka vyavahāraḥ na bhavati iti arthaḥ
evam śukti jñānena rajata jñānasya pratyakṣatas bādhanam
bhavati iti uktvā dvayoḥ api jñānayoḥ eka pramātṛ viśrāntyā
vinā anumānataḥ api paścāt bādhā na bhavati iti etat samarthayitum āha
nanu iti idam iti pramātṛ viśrāntyā vinā
parāmarśena tat pūrva anubhūtam vedyam parāmṛśyate

original: yatredaṃ rajatamiti rajata jñānamabhūt tatraiva viṣaye idānīṃ na

original: saṃbhavatyeva | taditi ekasminviṣaye jñānadvayā bhāvāt ānubhaviko

original: bādha vyavahāraḥ śukti jñānena rajata jñānasya
analyzed: bādha vyavahāraḥ śukti jñānena rajata jñānasya

original: śuktijñāne rajatajñānasya bādhā na sidhyati | yāvadanumānato'pi na

original: tasmin rūpyajñāne dharmiṇyaprāmāṇyaṃ sādhyodharmaḥ śukti natvād
analyzed: tasmin rūpya jñāne dharmiṇi aprāmāṇyam sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ

original: vā (268) na rajatamiti jñānatvād vā niṣayagataṃ

original: pramātṛjā cetyuktā tayoḥ śukti rajata jñānayoreka pramātṛviśrāntau
analyzed: pramātṛ jā ca iti uktā tayoḥ śukti rajata jñānayoḥ eka pramātṛ viśrāntau

original: idaṃ śuktijñānaṃ pramāṇabhūtaṃ bhūta pūrvaṃ rajatajñānaṃ
analyzed: idam śukti jñānam pramāṇa bhūtam bhūta pūrvam rajata jñānam

original: p. 229) pratidūṣaṇarūpaṃ jīvitaṃ miyadeva | ekamaneka svabhāvaṃ
analyzed: pratidūṣaṇa rūpam jīvitam ekam aneka svabhāvam
katham syāt iti tatra api uktam cit svabhāvasya ekasya eva darpaṇasya iva

original: tadekatāvabodhena śivādikṣityantābhāsa bhedasaṃbhaveka iva virodha iti
analyzed: tad ekatā avabodhena śiva ādi kṣiti anta ābhāsa bheda saṃbhava ikaḥ iva virodhaḥ iti
grāhya grāhaka tā bhinnau arthau bhātaḥ pramātari viśva rūpā

original: bheda saṃbhave'pi svarūpahānyabhāvāt sa evaṃ viśvarūpaḥ
analyzed: bheda saṃbhave api sva rūpa hāni abhāvāt saḥ evam viśva rūpaḥ
parameśvaraḥ iti pratyabhijñāna balāt ekaḥ api
pṛthivī ādi svabhāva bhedāt anyonya viruddha andyāḥ vat
svarga ādau aṅgīkurute tāvat te virodhāt eva nirbhāsamānāḥ tat ekam
tad nirbhāsanam kriyā āśrayam sampādayanti iti tatas ca kārya kāraṇa ādi

original: vakṣyamāṇānāṃ saṃbaṃdhādīnāmupapattiriti | tatra ca ka iva virodha iti
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇānām saṃbaṃdha ādīnām upapattiḥ iti tatra ca kaḥ iva virodhaḥ iti
saṃbaṃdha ādīnām upapattiḥ iti tattva parihāra rūpa
ekam eva param tattva maneka ākāram icchayā
tat krīḍati sva śaktīnām unmajjana nimajjanaiḥ iti
sūrya ādi sañcāra rūpāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ aruṇā
bhāsana anantaram udaya ābhāsaḥ tad anantaram prāhlādi ābhāsaḥ caitraḥ
pacati ityādau prathamam cullī saṃpādanam
tad anantaram indhana ādi saṃmārjanam
tad anaṃtaram agni pratiṣṭhāpanāt yodana pāka paryantam caitrāḥ gamyate iti
pūrva pada kṣepaṇa anantaram uttara pada prakṣepaṇam ityādi rūpa tvam
kramika tvam abhūta bhavati bhaviṣyati iti bhūta ādi kāla kalanā vihīne

original: bhagavati bhūta nāthe nāstīti kathamasya sā
analyzed: bhagavati bhūta nāthe na asti iti katham asya sā
bhūta ādi kāla krama saṃbandhī kriyā bhavet iti āśaṃkya tasmin tasyāḥ
kramika rūpāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ saṃbhāvanā api na asti sākramika rūpa
caitra maitra ādi saṃbandhinī eva bhavati iti āha laukikyā caitra maitra ādi

original: saṃbandhinyā gamana pacanādikriyāyāḥ ukta rūpaṃ sakramatva
analyzed: saṃbandhinyāḥ gamana pacana ādi kriyāyāḥ ukta rūpam sakrama tva
sāmarthyāt parameśvarāt

original: śaktiviśeṣāt | ghaṭate upapadyate | śāśvatyā iti | kālā spṛṣṭāyāḥ ata
analyzed: śakti viśeṣāt ghaṭate upapadyate śāśvatyā iti kālā spṛṣṭāyāḥ atas

original: eva nityāyāḥ prābhavyāḥ prabhu saṃbandhinyāḥ | kintu nirmāṇaśaktiḥ
analyzed: eva nityāyāḥ prābhavyāḥ prabhu saṃbandhinyāḥ kintu nirmāṇa śaktiḥ

original: sāpyevaṃ viduṣaḥ īśituḥ, tato vijñātṛvijñeya bhedo yadavabhāsyata iti
analyzed: sā api evam viduṣaḥ īśituḥ tatas vijñātṛ vijñeya bhedaḥ yat avabhāsyate iti
vakṣyamāṇa nītyā viśva jñātṛ vijñeyā

original: p. 230) bhāsana rūpāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ prabhoriva prabhutvaṃ na syāt |
analyzed: bhāsana rūpāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ prabhoḥ iva prabhu tvam na syāt
tadvataḥ prabhoḥ akrama tvāt saṃbhāvanā eva na asti utkṣipati hastam
tad anantaram avakṣipati iti hasta utkṣepa avakṣepaṇa ātmanā
kṣaṇa mātra kāla avasthāyi tatvāt kṣaṇāḥ te pūrva apara rūpa krama vantaḥ
yā eṣām laukikānām anabhijñāna kriyā
kiñcid abhijña tvena abhimatānām vaiśeṣikāṇām iva teṣām sā kriyā

original: ghaṭapaṭādivat pratyakṣeṇaiva bhāti | anye tu mantavya iti naiyāyikādayaḥ
analyzed: ghaṭa paṭa ādi vat pratyakṣeṇa eva bhāti anye tu mantavyaḥ iti naiyāyika ādayaḥ
tathā bhūtaḥ iti pratyakṣa paridṛśyamāna
atīndriyā cakṣuḥ ādi indriya gocarā caitra maitra ādi hasta gatā
utkṣepaṇa avakṣepaṇa ātmaka vyāpāra prabodha rūpā
indriya vat nityā anumeyā kriyā tasyāḥ anumeya tvāt
pūrvāparībhūta tvam api anumīyate iti pratyakṣa ātmanā anumeya ātmanā ca

original: prakāreṇa laukikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sakramatvaṃ kālaśaktirata iti
analyzed: prakāreṇa laukikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sakrama tvam kāla śaktiḥ atas iti
aruṇa ādi ābhāsa viccheda sphuṭa prabhā puñja ādi ābhāsa darśana

original: sāmarthya rūpāt parameśvarāt śkativiśeṣādupapadyate ghaṭe upapadyate
analyzed: sāmarthya rūpāt parameśvarāt ghaṭe upapadyate

original: | yā tu prābhavī prabhoḥ saṃbandhinī tadavyatiriktā śāśvatī prabhuvat
analyzed: yā tu prābhavī prabhoḥ saṃbandhinī tad avyatiriktā śāśvatī prabhu vat

original: kālenā saṃspṛṣṭā kriyāśaktiḥ tasyāḥ sakramtvamastīti astīti
analyzed: kālena ā saṃspṛṣṭā kriyāśaktiḥ tasyāḥ sakram tvam asti iti asti iti

original: saṃbhāvanāpi nāsti | turapyarthe | prabhoriveti | yathā prabhoḥ kālakramā
analyzed: saṃbhāvanā api na asti tuḥ api arthe prabhoḥ iva iti yathā prabhoḥ kāla kramā

original: bhāvāt sakramatvaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ tathā tasyāpyasaṃbhāvyam | uktaṃ
analyzed: bhāvāt sakrama tvam saṃbhāvyam tathā tasya api asaṃbhāvyam uktam

original: hīti | utkṣipati avakṣipatītyatra hastasya samramatve tadgatāpi kriyā sa
analyzed: hi iti utkṣipati avakṣipati iti atra hastasya samrama tve tad gatā api kriyā sa
krama iti
nanu iti kāla śaktitaḥ iti uktam sa kālaḥ bhāvānām idānīm
tanaḥ ayam ityādi rūpeṇa viśeṣaṇa bhāvam upagacchan tān bhāvān svena

original: bhūtādinā rūpeṇa tasmin tasmin kṣaṇe abhūvan bhavanti bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: bhūtādinā rūpeṇa tasmin tasmin kṣaṇe abhūvan bhavanti bhaviṣyanti
avacchinatti tad anya kāla āveśa asaha tvam tasya

original: bhūtasya kālasya viśeṣya niṣṭhatvādviśeṣya vyatirekeṇa kālo na
analyzed: bhūtasya kālasya viśeṣya niṣṭha tvāt viśeṣya vyatirekeṇa kālaḥ na
dṛśyate iti

original: tatra kosau kālo nāmetyāśaṃkya kāla svarūpameva
analyzed: tatra kaḥ asau kālaḥ nāma iti āśaṃkya kāla svarūpam eva

original: nirūpayitumāha - kāla iti | kālonāma sūryacandrādīnāṃ sañcāraḥ |
analyzed: nirūpayitum āha kālaḥ iti sūrya candra ādīnām sañcāraḥ

original: tattadvasantādi ṣa irtu bhavan tattat sahakāra mallikādīnāṃ
analyzed: tat tat vasanta ādi bhavan tat tat sahakāra mallikā ādīnām
ghrāṇa ādi indriya viṣayāṇām panasa ādi phalānām janma vā

original: p. 231) (298) athavā sparśendriya grāhye śītoṣṇe kālaḥ tallakṣyata iti |
analyzed: athavā sparśa indriya grāhye śīta uṣṇe kālaḥ tat lakṣyate iti

original: eva kramaḥ krama eva kālaḥ ityeva kāro bhinna kramaḥ | yathoktam -
analyzed: eva kramaḥ kramaḥ eva kālaḥ iti eva kāraḥ bhinna kramaḥ yathoktam
nilīyamānaiḥ vihagaiḥ nimīladbhiḥ ca paṅkajaiḥ

original: vikasantyā ca mālatyā gato'staṃ jñāyate raviḥ ||
analyzed: vikasantyā ca mālatyā gataḥ astam jñāyate raviḥ

original: ye iyattayā pariniṣṭhitā ekasmin meṣādi rāśau candrasya
analyzed: ye iyattayā pariniṣṭhitā ekasmin meṣa ādi rāśau candrasya
pāda adhikena ahorātra dvayena sañcāraḥ sūryasya ekāṃsmin rāśau
māsena sañcāraḥ aṅgārasya tricatvāriṃśāt divasena saṃcāraḥ

original: bṛhaspaterekāsmin rāśau ekena vatsareṇa sañcāraḥ budhaśukrayoḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspateḥ eka asmin rāśau ekena vatsareṇa sañcāraḥ budha śukrayoḥ

original: ekasmin rāśau pañcaviśaddinena sañcāraḥ sārdhena vatsara dvayena
analyzed: ekasmin rāśau pañcaviśaddinena sañcāraḥ sārdhena vatsara dvayena
śaneḥ iti puṣpa phalānām tad tad ṛtu rūpa māsa dvaya mātram iti
śīta uṣṇayoḥ pratyekam saṅkṣepeṇa māla ṣaṭkam iyat tā candra sūrya
ca śīta uṣṇa para mṛtavilāsa udarye iyat tayā pariniṣṭhita

original: | ābhāsāḥ siddhāḥ ta evakālaḥ | kathamiti cet - apariniṣṭhitaṃ
analyzed: ābhāsāḥ siddhāḥ te eva kālaḥ katham iti ced apariniṣṭhitam
gamana paṭhana ādikaiḥ sūrya ādi sañcāraiḥ apiniṣṭhitam pariniṣṭhā rahitam

original: gamana paṭhanādi divasena daśayojanaṃ gataḥ divasena devadattograntha
analyzed: gamana paṭhana ādi divasena daśa yojanam gataḥ divasena

original: sahasraṃ paṭhitavān | ahorātreṇaiva trisahasraṃ granthaṃ likhitavāniti
analyzed: sahasram paṭhitavān ahorātreṇa eva tri sahasram grantham likhitavān iti
yat tayā pariniṣkriyate kanakam niṣka śatam niṣka sahasram iti
pratimāna vatakaiḥ eva candra sūrya ādīnām

original: sañcāraviśeṣaḥ paramārthataḥ krama kāla eva kramaṃ kram eva kālaḥ
analyzed: sañcāra viśeṣaḥ paramārthataḥ krama kālaḥ eva kramam kram eva kālaḥ

original: ityevakāro bhinna bhinnakramo yojyaḥ | imau ghaṭa paṭau
analyzed: iti eva kāraḥ bhinna bhinna kramaḥ yojyaḥ imau ghaṭa paṭau
idānīntanau iti ābhāsa yaugapadya avabhāsau api
tadānīntana kāla āviṣṭa apara ghaṭa paṭa ādi ābhāsa apekṣayā kramaḥ eva

original: kālasya ayaṃ ghaṭāścireṇa nirmitaḥ (299) ayaṃ ghaṭo'cireṇa jātaḥ
analyzed: kālasya ayam ghaṭāḥ cireṇa nirmitaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ acireṇa jātaḥ

original: idānīṃ phalamacireṇa pakvamidāmiti cireṇa pakvamiti cirākṣipradidhīrapi
analyzed: idānīm phalam acireṇa pakvam idām iti cireṇa pakvam iti cira akṣi pradidhīḥ api
vitata avitata tva vaśāt pūrva apara ātmaka krama rūpa ābhāsa bhedaḥ eva vartate

original: kramo nāmaikasya prakāśane anyasya prakāśanābhāvaḥ | kācasya ciratva
analyzed: kramaḥ nāma ekasya prakāśane anyasya prakāśana abhāvaḥ kācasya cira tva
pratītau vartamānāyām tadānīm eva aciratva pratīti abhāvāt

original: cirakṣiprādidhīrapi krama eva | kāla saṃbandhinī paratva buddhiḥ anubhūta
analyzed: cira kṣipra ādi dhīḥ api krame eva kāla saṃbandhinī paratva buddhiḥ anubhūta

original: viṣaya viśeṣaṇatvāt sphuṭā aparatva buddhiḥ bhaviṣyadviṣaya
analyzed: viṣaya viśeṣaṇa tvāt sphuṭā aparatva buddhiḥ bhaviṣyat viṣaya
viśeṣaṇa tvāt asphuṭā tatra evā iti krame tulyena
sūrya sañcāra ādinā sahamīyamānaḥ hema sthānīyaḥ devadattasya
gamana rūpa ābhāsa bhedaḥ ittham ucyate divasam gacchati iti kāla adhvanoḥ iti

original: dvitīyā | apariniṣṭhitā devadatta gamanādikriyā itthaṃ kālenaiva
analyzed: dvitīyā apariniṣṭhitā devadatta gamana ādi kriyā ittham kālena eva
pariniṣṭhīyate

original: nanviti | kālaḥ idānīntano'yaṃ tadānīntano'yamiti idānīṃ tana --
analyzed: nanu iti kālaḥ idānīntanaḥ ayam tadānīntanaḥ ayam iti idānīm
ṣu niṣṭha tvāt kaṭhina tva ādi vat

original: tadbhāvasvabhāvabhūta evāstu tattadbhāva vyatirekeṇa kāla iti
analyzed: tad bhāva svabhāva bhūtaḥ eva astu tad tad bhāva vyatirekeṇa kālaḥ iti

original: kaścinnavidyate | tasya svata eva sthityabhāva----------------------- kālaḥ
analyzed: kaścid na vidyate tasya svatas eva sthiti abhāva kālaḥ
bhāva svabhāva bheda mātram na bhavati iti āha pūrva apara rūpaḥ

original: kramoyaḥ sa bhedāśrayaḥ | bhedonāma anyonyābhāsa vyavacchede nā
analyzed: krama ūyaḥ sa bhedāśrayaḥ

original: tadānīṃ vidyamāne naikaikābhāsa sphuraṇaṃ tadbhedameva vyaktī karoti
analyzed: tadānīm vidyamāne na ekaika ābhāsa sphuraṇam tad bhedam eva vyaktī karoti
bhedaḥ api sattvāt āgama ādi

original: puñjasyāsadbhavati | tayorābhāsayoḥ sadasatve ca citrābhāsa kṛtā
analyzed: tayoḥ ābhāsayoḥ sat asatve ca citra ābhāsa kṛtā
prabhoḥ sva rūpa ācchādanā prakāśena prabhavana śīlāt
parameśvarāt eva bhaktaḥ prabhoḥ citra avabhāsa kṛta tvam nāma sva ātmani
pratibhāsamāna ekaikasmin ghāṭayā bhāse lo
yam unnataḥ ayam dṛḍhaḥ yam ityādi viśeṣāṇām sāmānādhikaraṇyena

original: yojayitṛtvaṃ ghaṭā bhāsa paṭābhāsa yoranyonyaśleṣābhāsā bhāvena
analyzed: yojayitṛ tvam bhāvena
sva ātmani pṛthak sthāpanam yathoktam
krayaḥ yaḥ deśa kāla ātmā bheda prāṇaḥ ca saṃvidām
vicchedāt eṣa vijñātuḥ vicitra ābhāsa tā iyataḥ iti

original: kramātmā kālaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvabhāvamātraṃ yadisyāt tarhyaṅguli |
analyzed: krama ātmā kālaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāva bhāvamātram yadi syāt tarhi aṅguli
catuṣṭayam anyonyam hrasva dīrgha tāyāḥ bhinna svabhāvam iti
ekam eva aṅgulī svarūpam bhinna kālam bhavet

original: tasmātkālasvabhāvabhedamātraṃ na bhavati | tarhi kāla svarūpaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt kāla svabhāva bheda mātram na bhavati tarhi kāla svarūpam

original: kīdṛśamiti cedāha - tasmaditi | kālasya bhāva svabhāvatvā bhāvāt
analyzed: kīdṛśam iti ced āha tasmat iti kālasya bhāva svabhāva tva abhāvāt

original: aruṇā bhāvasya sadbhāvasphuṭa prabhāpuñjasya cāsadbhāva ityābhāsa
analyzed: bhāvasya sadbhāva sphuṭa prabhā puñjasya ca asadbhāvaḥ

original: sadbhāvānuprāṇito yo bhedastadāśraya iti tadbheda kṛtaḥ
analyzed: sadbhāva anuprāṇitaḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ tad āśrayaḥ iti tad bheda kṛtaḥ

original: kālātmākramaḥ | etaduktaṃ kālo hi bhāvānāṃ bhāsanābhāsanātmā
analyzed: kāla ātmā akramaḥ etat uktam kālaḥ hi bhāvānām bhāsana abhāsana ātmā

original: kramo'vacchedaka iti ābhāsayostau bhāvā bhāvau prakāśādbāhyena
analyzed: kramaḥ avacchedakaḥ iti ābhāsayoḥ tau bhāvāḥ bhāvau prakāśāt bāhyena
nitya anumeyena a hetunā

original: p. 233) bimbatvenābhimate nārthena na kṛtāviticidātmaiva hi deva iti
analyzed: bimba tvena abhimate na arthena na kṛtau iti cit ātmā eva hi devaḥ iti

original: svāminaścātmasaṃstha iti ātmāna mata evāyamiti bhāvā
analyzed: svāminaḥ ca ātma saṃsthaḥ iti mataḥ eva ayam iti
bhāva avabhāsānām iti cit maya tve avabhāsānām ityādau

original: vistāryopapāditamiti saṃvitsvabhāva ātmā yaḥ svapne saṅkalpādau ca
analyzed: vistārya upapāditam iti saṃvid svabhāvaḥ ātmā yaḥ svapne saṅkalpa ādau ca
tat tat gaja turaga ādyāḥ vaicitrya nirmāṇe prabhuḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ iti
sarva pramāṇānām sva ātma tvena sthita tvāt saṃviditaḥ

original: svānubhavasiddhaḥ | tata eveti tasmādeva prabhostau bhavataḥ | ata eva
analyzed: sva anubhava siddhaḥ tatas eva iti tasmāt eva prabhoḥ tau bhavataḥ atas eva
sva rūpa antar kroḍīkṛtam aparam avibhinna ākāram ātmani
parigṛhya kañcid eva artham sva rūpāt unmagnam ābhāsayati iti
nītyā sa prabhuḥ nīla ādi unmajja nimajja vat
sphuṭa prabhā puñja ādi rūpam anyam kāla ābhāsam bhedena
parigṛhya ekaikam aruṇa ādi ābhāsam unamjjayati sa prabhuḥ śiva ādi kṣiti anta
viśvam unīlayati iti nītyā a nīla ādīn ābhāsānā bhāsayan tatra api citra tayā
nānā rūpa tvena bhāsate citra tā āpādanam eva sphuṭayati
sva ātmani ābhāsamānam ghaṭa ābhāsam adhikaraṇī kṛtya lohita ābhāsam
dṛḍha ābhāsam unnatāḥ bhāsām atyadita tad sāmānya ābhāsam tasmin eva

original: tadviśeṣaṇabhūtatvenābhāsayati | kiṃ ca tatraiva svātmani darpaṇatala
analyzed: tad viśeṣaṇa bhūta tvena ābhāsayati kim ca tatra eva sva ātmani darpaṇa tala

original: ivānyonya śleṣābhāsaḥ paṭābhāsaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthaktvenāvabhāsayati
analyzed: iva anyonya śleṣa ābhāsaḥ paṭa ābhāsam ca pṛthak pṛthaktvena avabhāsayati
saṃvid maye etat lohita ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyā bhāsam anyonya
ghaṭa paṭa ādi ābhāsam śā antara tvāt pramātṛ aikye iti ukta nītyā
sva ātmani pramātṛ aikya rūpe na eka rasena ābhāsayati tatra ekasmin aikyā

original: bhāse ābhāsānāṃ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pṛthaktvābhāsaśca na
analyzed: bhāse ābhāsānām viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pṛthaktva ābhāsaḥ ca na
bhavati sva ātma aikyena prakāśamāna tvāt

original: iti vakṣyamāṇe deśakrama ihaivā sūcitaḥ | deśakramasyāpi
analyzed: iti vakṣyamāṇe deśa kramaḥ iha evā sūcitaḥ deśa kramasya api
sva viśeṣaṇa bhūta kāla krama apekṣi tvāt iyati iti sāmānādhikaraṇya ātmani
dṛś tva ābhāsa ātmani ghaṭa paṭa ādi saṃbandhini ābhāse
ābhāsa tva asatva kṛta bheda āśrayasya kāla kramasya udayaḥ na syāt

original: kālakramasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpamāha - yadā tu śaradābhāsaṃ

tad saṃbandha tatvam eva ekayanatayā prādhānyena vyutpādanīyam
vicāraṇīyam kartari jñātari iti ukta nītyā jñātṛ kartṛ svarūpa pramātṛ
niṣṭha tvāt tat tu sambaṃdhaka tvam eva jñāpya jñāpaka tā

original: kāryakāraṇatā ceti dvividham | tatreti | jñāpya jñāpakatā rūpe
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa tā ca iti dvividham tatra iti jñāpya jñāpaka tā rūpe
meya mānam iti mātṛ cintā āspada bhūte pūrva saṃbandhe kriyā
saṃbandha ityādinā svakīyam yat svarūpam uktam asmin āhnike

original: vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca yat tatsarvaṃ pramāṇāyattam | yathā ghaṭādi vastu
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇam ca yat tat sarvam pramāṇa āyattam yathā ghaṭa ādi vastu
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa āyattam tadvat ghaṭa ādi niṣṭham
saṃbandha ādi rūpam api tatra tatra darśane vastu siddhiḥ
pramāṇa āyattā iti prasiddheḥ evam ca iti tat tat vastu siddhi apekṣyā
vyāpāra vat pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ api nitya tvam

original: svaprakāśatva syāpi tatra bhāvāt ityukta nītyā prakṛte evaṃ bhūtaṃ hi
analyzed: tatra bhāvāt ityukta nītyā prakṛte evam bhūtam hi

original: pramāṇaṃ tadevaṃ bhūte bhagavati kathaṃ kramatāmiti
analyzed: pramāṇam tat evam bhūte bhagavati katham kramatām iti

original: vakṣyamāṇanītyā samarthanīye ca parama śivasvarūpavastuni pūrvaḥ
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa nītyā samarthanīye ca parama śiva sva rūpa vastuni pūrvaḥ

original: paricchinna pramātṛ lagnaṃ na ghaṭata iti prakṛta samarthanīya
analyzed: paricchinna pramātṛ lagnam na ghaṭate iti prakṛta samarthanīya
vastu upayogi tayā svayam ca saṃbandha rūpa tayā
ca iti ubhaya prakāreṇa avaśya vicāryam māna meyam iti pramātṛ svarūpam
nirūpayitum mā idam etādṛś iti vyavahāraḥ pravartyata
iti anta śloka saptadaśakena āhnika antaram ārabhyate tatra śloka dvayena

original: pramāṇapalayoḥ svarūpaṃ nirūpyate | pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādiḥ phalaṃ
analyzed: pramāṇa palayoḥ svarūpam nirūpyate pramāṇam pratyakṣa ādiḥ phalam
prabhā
tasmin ghaṭa paṭa ādi prameya ghaṭa tva kāñcana tva lohita tva

original: jjvalatvādirūpānābhāsāt pratipramāṇavyāpāro na bhavati | na tu
svalakṣaṇātmaka vastvekaniṣṭhatādi niyameneti na kevala manekasāmānya
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa ātmaka vastu eka niṣṭha tā ādi niyamena iti na kevala maneka sāmānya
samudāya rūpe deśa kāla viśiṣṭe sva lakṣaṇe eva eka smin
pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ iti darśayitum pramātuḥ pratyavamarśa balena
sāmānya ātmanaḥ
sva lakṣaṇa ātmanaḥ ca ābhāsasya prameyasya vyavasthā iti daśabhiḥ
ślokaiḥ ucyate tad prasaṅgāt iti pratyavamarśa prasaṅgāt
mithyājñāna svarūpam ślokena ucyate sāmānya ātmaka sva lakṣaṇa ātmaka
dvividhasya prameyasya siddhiḥ ca kartari jñātari iti
prakṛtam īśvara svarūpam avalambya eva ghaṭate iti ślokena upadarśyate

original: caturdaśabhiśślokairnirūpitaḥ sa caiṣa pramāṇa tatphala prameyādi
analyzed: caturdaśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ nirūpitaḥ sa ca eṣa

original: pravibhāgo yaḥ sa pūrvaślokena pradarśita rūpe pramātari sati bhavati |
analyzed: pravibhāgaḥ yaḥ sa pūrva ślokena pradarśita rūpe pramātari sati bhavati

original: tataḥ pramāṇaṃ syāt vyutpattibhūtatvāt tasya ghaṭādivat prameyaṃ na
analyzed: tatas pramāṇam syāt vyutpatti bhūta tvāt tasya ghaṭa ādi vat prameyam na

original: bhavati | yena prameyatvena atrāpi viśvottīrṇe pramātari
analyzed: bhavati yena prameya tvena atra api viśva uttīrṇe pramātari
pramāṇa vyāpāra saṃbhavaḥ asmin ātmani īśvaraḥ aham pūrṇaḥ aham
nityaḥ aham vyāptaḥ aham iti a pravartita pūrveśvara ādi vyavahāra mātra
sādhana phalam īśvara pratyabhijñā śāstra ātmakam pramāṇam iti
śloka trayeṇa ucyate iti tātparyāḥ tena bhrāntiḥ īdṛśī iti anena

original: kriyāsaṃbandhādi buddhyo na bhrānti svabhāvā iti yaduktaṃ tāsāṃ
analyzed: kriyā saṃbandha ādi buddhyaḥ na bhrānti svabhāvāḥ iti yat uktam tāsām
bhrānti svabhāva tvam eva nirṇetum bahirmukha vijñāna ātmaka svabhāvasya
pramāṇasya tad phala iti tad pramāṇa prāṇa bhūtasya phalasya
pramā rūpasya antarmukhasya vimarśasya ca svarūpam
tāvat naiyāyika ādi darśana prasiddham anuvadati idam etādṛś iti vastu
nīla pīta ādikam idam iti sarvatra idanta ātmaka vastu anusyūta sāmānya rūpeṇa
etādṛś iti aneka sāmānya sa hita deśa kāla viśiṣṭa

original: svalakṣaṇarūpeṇa ca | evamiti ubhyaprakāreṇa yadvaśādvyavatiṣṭhata iti |
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa rūpeṇa ca evam iti ubhya prakāreṇa yad vaśāt vyavatiṣṭhate iti

original: yasya balānniyatāṃ nijanijāṃ prakāśamaryādāṃ nātivartate | tat
analyzed: yasya balāt niyatām nija nijām prakāśa maryādām na ativartate tat

original: pramāṇamiti ślokevyavahriyata iti śeṣaḥ | so'pīti | saḥ pramāṇarūpo
analyzed: pramāṇam iti śloke vyavahriyate iti śeṣaḥ saḥ api iti saḥ pramāṇa rūpaḥ
bodhaḥ pratikṣaṇam deśa kāla nava nava prameya unmukha tvāt
svayam api abhinavaḥ nava nava udayaḥ su ābhāsaḥ iti māyā
pramātuḥ mā bhedam iti sattvena abhimataḥ sa pramāṇa abhimata ābhāsaḥ

original: antariti | bahiryathā bhūtaṃ nīlapītādi antastathā vimarśātmābhūtvā
analyzed: antar iti bahis yathā bhūtam nīla pīta ādi antar tathā vimarśa ātmā a bhūtvā
deśa kāla ādi abhedini deśa kāla ākāraiḥ aviśiṣṭe atas eva sāmānyāyamāne

original: ghaṭaḥ kāṃcanolohita ityekaikabhidhāna viṣaye kāñcanādi vastuni na
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ kāṃcanaḥ lohitaḥ iti ekaika abhidhāna viṣaye kāñcana ādi vastuni na
rajatam iti tad pramāṇa phala rūpā pramā bhavati

original: p. 261) yadvaśāditi | yasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt vastviti bahiṣkaraṇa viṣaya
analyzed: yad vaśāt iti yasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt vastu iti bahiṣkaraṇa viṣaya

original: nīlādi antaḥ karaṇaviṣaya sukhādi ca idamiti sarvagatedantānusyūte
analyzed: nīla ādi antar karaṇa viṣaya sukha ādi ca idam iti
sāmānya rūpeṇa etādṛś iti iti ittham atratyam idānīṃtanam evam ākāram iti
viśeṣaṇa bhūta tad tad viśeṣaṇa rūpa dharma antara yogena ca vyavatiṣṭhate

original: nīlamiti sukhamiti ca niyatāṃ svocitāṃ svaprakāśamaryādāṃ nāti
analyzed: nīlam iti sukham iti ca niyatām sva ucitām sva prakāśa maryādām na ati
vartate tat tādṛgvidha vastu vyavasthāpaka jñānam loke
sthitam akṣapāda pramukhaiḥ niścitam iti śeṣaḥ tat
pramāṇa svarūpa vivecakena tad pramāṇa svarūpa vicāra kṣameṇa vicāryam
tad vicāra prakāram paśya iha ghaṭa paṭa ādeḥ vastunaḥ svarūpam pramātṛ
pramāṇam antareṇa sva ātma vaśena

original: yaduktam tathā hi jaḍabhūtānāmityādi | jaḍatvāt svātmavaśenaiva
analyzed: yat uktam tathā hi jaḍa bhūtānām ityādi jaḍa tvāt svātma vaśena eva

original: vyavatiṣṭhate cet nīlaṃ prakāśate caitrasya nīlaṃ prakāśata ityavabhāsaḥ
analyzed: vyavatiṣṭhate ced nīlam prakāśate caitrasya nīlam prakāśate iti avabhāsaḥ
katham bhavet tasmāt iti sva ātma vaśena
vyavasthāpana abhāvāt anya vaśena vyavatiṣṭhate iti tat vastu vyāpakaḥ
tad anyaḥ pramāṇa ābhasaḥ api tad vastu vat jaḍaḥ ced tat idam andhena aṃdhasya

original: hastadānam | jaḍarūpaḥ pramāṇābhāso vastu vyavasthāpana kṣamo na
analyzed: hasta dānam jaḍa rūpaḥ pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ vastu vyavasthāpana kṣamaḥ na
bhavati iti arthaḥ tasmāt vastu vyavasthāpanāya āyātaḥ
tad pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ saṃvid ātmā eva bhavati saḥ api iti saṃvid ātmā
pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ api saṃvid ātma tvāt eva mahā saṃvid samudre
śuddhe paramāśive magnaḥ bhūtvā śuddhaḥ tadvān nirviśeṣaḥ

original: paripūrṇaścet nīlasyaikasyaiva vyavasthā heturna bhavet | tadaiva
analyzed: paripūrṇaḥ ced nīlasya ekasya eva vyavasthā hetuḥ na bhavet tadā eva
pīta ādau api tasya pramāṇa ābhāsasya vyāpaka tvāt
mahā prakāśa magna tvāt yugapad eva mahā prakāśa vat yugapad eva
viśva vyavasthāpaka tvāt tatas iti nīla pīta ādeḥ yugapad vyavasyā eva
vyavasthāpaka tva prasaṅgāt asau pramāṇābhāsaḥ
mahā prakāśa vat vyatiriktaḥ nīla mātra uparaktakaḥ atas eva nīla unmukhaḥ

original: tata evaṃ nīlaprakāśa svabhāvaḥ nīlasyaiva vyavasthāpakaḥ nīlaprakāśa
analyzed: tatas evam nīla prakāśa svabhāvaḥ nīlasya eva vyavasthāpakaḥ nīla prakāśa

original: svabhāvataiva hitasya pramāṇābhāsakasya tannīlavyavasthāpakatā | sa ca
analyzed: svabhāva tā eva hitasya pramāṇa ābhāsakasya tad nīla vyavasthāpaka tā sa ca
nīlasya prakāśaḥ mahā prakāśa vat vyatiriktasya nīlasya prakāśa ced tarhi

original: pītasyāpi prakāśaḥ syāt | tasya pītasya prakāśātmaka cittattva
analyzed: pītasya api prakāśaḥ syāt tasya pītasya prakāśa ātmaka cit tattva
tādātmyāḥ viśeṣāt tena tasmāt mahā prakāśāt vyatiriktasya nīlasya eva

original: p 262) pramāṇābhāsaḥ prakāśo bhavati | nīlamapītthaṃ cet tataḥ
analyzed: pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ prakāśaḥ bhavati nīlam api ittham ced tatas
yogyam sa nīla prakāśakaḥ
pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ mahā prakāśāt vyati rekaḥ kiñcid api iti
rikta ābhāsa yogyam sa nīla prakāśakaḥ pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ
mahāprakā ākāśāt vyatiricyeta ced tasya pramāṇa ābhāsasya
mahā prakāśa vat vyatireke itatas nīla ādeḥ api vyatireka abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: mahāprakāśādvyatirekaḥ kiñcidapīti prameya mapi pramāṇa mapi
analyzed: mahā prakāśāt vyatirekaḥ kiñcid api iti

original: pramātāpi na sahata iti paramaśivātmakena mahāprakāśena
analyzed: pramātā api na sahate iti paramaśiva ātmakena mahā prakāśena
svātantryāt pūrṇa ahantā svarūpe sva ātmani saṃvidaḥ
maheśvaraḥ na aham

original: ghaṭādiḥ caitra eveti saṅkocānirbhāsanīyaḥ |  ayaṃ saṅkocaḥ nāhaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭa ādiḥ caitraḥ eva iti saṅkoca a nirbhāsanīyaḥ ayam saṅkocaḥ na aham

original: maheśvara ityādyanyonya saṅkoca prāṇatvāt śūnya ityucyate | evaṃ
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ ityādi anyonya saṅkoca prāṇa tvāt śūnyaḥ iti ucyate evam
bhūtaḥ saṅkoca ābhāsaḥ eva māyīya pramātuḥ utthānam

original: mahāprakāśasyā evaṃ bhūtayā ekayā (346) advitīyayā sṛṣṭiśaktyā
analyzed: mahā prakāśasya evam bhūtayā ekayā advitīyayā sṛṣṭi śaktyā
sva ātmanaḥ saṅkoca avabhāsa rūpayā ekasmin eva kāle pramātṛ
saṅkoca avabhāsaḥ eva māyā pramātuḥ utthāna hetu tvāt

original: pramāṇaprameyollāsaṃ paramārthato bhavati | tena tasmāt supto'haṃ
analyzed: pramāṇa prameya ullāsam paramārthataḥ bhavati tena tasmāt suptaḥ aham
mūrchitaḥ aham sukhī aham duḥkhī aham kṣidhitaḥ aham pipāsitaḥ aham
shūlaḥ aham kṛśaḥ aham sampannaḥ aham daridraḥ aham iti krameṇa

original: parigrahasaṅkucitāttu ata eva dehādergrāhakasya yo vedyāṃśaḥ sa eva
analyzed: parigraha saṅkucitāt tu atas eva deha ādeḥ grāhakasya yaḥ vedya aṃśaḥ saḥ eva
bhagavatā sṛjyate saṃhriyate ca anatvā ahantā prakāśa ātmakam
kartṛ rūpam tasya deha ādi āveśe api bhagavat eka rūpa tvāt iti ukta nītyā
dehapāte api sargam ārabhya ananta kālam aham iti antarmukha

original: saṃvedana rūpānmāyā pramātussaṃbandhī sa prāṇābhimata ābhāsaḥ
analyzed: saṃvedana rūpāt māyā pramātuḥ saṃbandhī sa prāṇa abhimataḥ ābhāsaḥ
yāvat ghaṭa paṭa ādi prameya unmukhataḥ svabhāvaḥ tāvat prameyasya
deśa kāla ākāra ābhāsa saṃbhedavat tvena anya rūpa tvāt saḥ api iti
tad vyavasthāpakaḥ pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ api meya vat kṣaṇe
kṣaṇe anyonya rūpaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ etasya bhinava udayaḥ iti
sūtra padena padasya artham āha tat tat kṣaṇika kāla viśiṣṭa vastu
vyavasthāpaka tvena svayam api kṣaṇika tvāt kasmiṃścid api vastuni

original: p. 263) na kalaṃkitaḥ | tenākalaṅkitatvena nava navodaya ityu------------- pi
analyzed: na kalaṃkitaḥ tena a kalaṅkita tvena nava nava udayaḥ iti u pi

original: tathā bhūtaḥ prāṇābhāsaḥ māyā pramātṛlagno bhavet | tarhi
analyzed: tathā bhūtaḥ prāṇa ābhāsaḥ māyā pramātṛ lagnaḥ bhavet tarhi

original: yasyamama nīlā bhāso jātastasya mamaiva pītābhāsa iti pratītirna bhavet |
analyzed: nīlā bhāsaḥ jātaḥ tasya mama eva pīta ābhāsaḥ iti pratītiḥ na bhavet

original: mama nīlābhāsa ityetat sarvasya svānubhavasiddhaṃ sarvatra sarva
analyzed: mama nīla ābhāsaḥ iti etat sarvasya sva anubhava siddham sarvatra

original: smindeśe sarva sminkāle cābādhyamānamamāyamiti māyā pramātuḥ
analyzed: smin deśe sarva smin kāle ca a bādhyamānam amāyam iti māyā pramātuḥ

original: svatvenābhāsamāno nava nava prameyaunmukhyāt nava navodayo
analyzed: sva tvena ābhāsamānaḥ nava nava prameya aunmukhyāt nava nava udayaḥ

original: bodhābhāsaḥ | sapramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ vidhattaṃ yataḥ
kāsau pramāsvabhāveti cet | āha - sa evabodharūpaḥ pramāṇābhāsamiti
analyzed: kā asau pramā svabhāvā iti ced āha saḥ eva bodha rūpaḥ pramāṇa ābhāsam iti

original: pramārūpaṃ phalamiti saṃbandhaḥ | ghaṭaḥ kumbha iti vat
analyzed: pramā rūpam phalam iti saṃbandhaḥ ghaṭaḥ kumbhaḥ iti vat
pramāṇasya apara paryāyam pramā iti uktam bhavati na tat
pramāṇa phala rūpāyāḥ pramāyāḥ sarūpam na uktam
atra ābhāsa bodha rūpe abhāsaḥ bāhya ghaṭa ādi unmukhāyāḥ

original: prakāśarūpatayā pramāṇam | yā tu tasya pramāṇasyaiva prāgiti yā
analyzed: prakāśa rūpa tayā pramāṇam yā tu tasya pramāṇasya eva prāk iti yā
ca eṣā pratibhā iti atra upapāditā antarmukha ātmā vimarśa rūpa tā

original: tatsvabhāvena kevalaṃ viṣayadaśā saṃkuciteneti kevalamiti svātmanaḥ
analyzed: tad svabhāvena kevalam viṣaya daśā saṃkucitena iti kevalam iti sva ātmanaḥ
saṃvid rūpa tayā saṅkocāḥ bhāve api saṅkoce viṣaya bahirmukha
niścaya rūpayā daśayā saṃkucitena tad antar mukha ātmaka

original: vimarśasvabhāvena sa eva pramāṇabodhaḥ phalaṃ prabhā | eka eva
analyzed: vimarśa svabhāvena saḥ eva pramāṇa bodhaḥ phalam prabhā ekaḥ eva
bodha ābhāsaḥ bahirmukha rūpa tve pramāṇam antarmukha rūpa tve

original: rametyatra dṛṣṭānta prakaṭanena draḍhayati - yaḥ śūro'haṃ sa eva
analyzed: rama iti atra dṛṣṭānta prakaṭanena draḍhayati yaḥ śūraḥ aham saḥ eva

original: vijayīti | eka puruṣaniṣṭha śūratvavijayitve yato'haṃ śūraḥ tato vijayīti
analyzed: vijayī iti eka puruṣa niṣṭha śūra tva vijayi tve yatas aham śūraḥ tatas vijayī iti
hetu phala bhāvena vyavasthāpyate evam iti śūra tva vijayī tvayoḥ
hetu phala abhāva vat ekasmin eva nīle ekasya pramātuḥ bahis idam nīlam iti

original: prakāśo yatastataḥ antarnīlamidamiti parāmarśaḥ iti nīla saṃbaṃdhino
analyzed: prakāśaḥ yatas tatas antar nīlam idam iti parāmarśaḥ iti nīla
hetu phala bhāvaḥ tad vaśāt pramāṇa vaśāt prameya vyavasthāpnā ātmā
saṃbaṃdhinaḥ pramāṇasya vyāpāra rūpam phalam iti
pramātṛ saṃbandhinaḥ pramāṇa vyāpāra rūpam phalam vyāpāraḥ ca
vyāpriyamāṇāt pramātuḥ tena prameyam
prativyāpāryamāṇāt anya ākāraḥ iti abhedaḥ iti abhedaḥ pramāṇa phalayoḥ
pramāṇam api pramātuḥ vimarśa balena eva pramāṇam bhavati
sarva pramāṇa pramāṇa bhūtaḥ vimarśaḥ
sa pramāṇa prāṇa bhūtaḥ deśa kāla ādi
rūpaiḥ ābhāsa antaraiḥ anāmṛṣṭā iti atas eva eka rūpe sarvatra anusyūte

original: sāmānyātmanivastuni ghaṭa iti lohita iti ghaṭa gata ghaṭatva lohitatvādiṣu
analyzed: sāmānya ātmani vastuni ghaṭaḥ iti lohitaḥ iti ghaṭa gata ghaṭa tva lohita tva ādiṣu
abhidhāna rūpaḥ śabdaḥ pravartate yatas vastūnām atratyam idānīm
tanam iti
sva lakṣaṇa tva karaṇa pravaṇayoḥ deśa kāla ābhāsayoḥ an āmiśraṇāt vyāpte

original: nitye ata eva sāmānyāya māne ghaṭatvakāñcanatvādyābhāse

original: tattadabhidhānaśabda jīvita vimarśa dvārā pramāṇaṃ pravartate | ghaṭa
analyzed: tad tad abhidhāna śabda jīvita vimarśa dvārā pramāṇam pravartate ghaṭa

original: purovasthitatābhāsamātre viśrānta ityukta mācārya pādaireva niyateti yo

original: yo bhāvaḥ ayamayamiti pramātuḥ puroniyatatvena bhāti |
analyzed: yaḥ bhāvaḥ ayam ayam iti pramātuḥ puras niyata tvena bhāti

sarva deśa gata kāñcana anusyūtaḥ bhāti tadvat ghaṭa gataḥ ayam iti ābhāsaḥ

original: sarvadeśagata ghaṭapaṭādyanusyūtedantā sāmānyenaiva jāyata iti | tata
analyzed: sarva deśa gata ghaṭa paṭa ādi anusyūta idantā sāmānyena eva jāyate iti tata

vastu sva lakṣaṇam tu kāñcana tva ādi sāmānya rūpa tvāt
sāmānya rūpa ābhāsa mātram bhāsa adhikaraṇa bhūtam ete eva ekaika

original: manyadābhāsāntaram | ata eva sāmānyebhyo'nyat tatra tasmillakṣaṇe

original: prathane va pramāṇaṃ tat svalakṣaṇa grāhakaṃ pramāṇam | tasmin

original: svalakṣaṇe miśrīkāryeṣu teṣu ekaikena pramāṇena gṛhīteṣu
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇe miśrīkāryeṣu teṣu ekaikena pramāṇena gṛhīteṣu

original: vimarśarūpasya vimarśaśca śabda jīvita ityasmadukta nayena prāṇitasya
analyzed: vimarśa rūpasya vimarśaḥ ca śabda jīvitaḥ iti asmad ukta nayena prāṇitasya

iti adhyavasāya apekṣam sva mate pramāṇasya pramāṇyam vadatā
vijñāna vādinā api an icchatā api pratyābhāsa niṣṭham eva

original: vimarśa eva yadi pramāṇa vyāpārastarhi sa tarhi dvicandre'pyāsti |

original: p. 265) dvicandro na saṃbhavatyeva | kāñcana iti sa vimarśaḥ
analyzed: dvi candraḥ na saṃbhavati eva kāñcanaḥ iti sa vimarśaḥ

original: vimarśenānunmūlitavṛttirata eva sthiraḥ san tathā bhavati |

śukti rajata vat madhye punar unmūlanam sahate ced pūrvam api tathā iti iti

jñānānām udiyāt eka pramātṛ pariniṣṭhiteḥ iti ukta nītyā

na aham rūpeṇa pramātṛ vapuṣā

original: kāñcanaṃ na bhavatītyara svasaṃvideva svānubhava eva
analyzed: kāñcanam na bhavati iti ara sva saṃvid eva sva anubhavaḥ eva

original: sākṣiṇīdūrataḥ śukti mālokya nairmalyātpūrvaṃ yat satyarūpeṇa
analyzed: sākṣiṇī dūrataḥ śukti mālokya nairmalyāt pūrvam yat satya rūpeṇa

original: dṛṣṭaṃ tadevedaṃ rajatamiti śuktiviṣaye bhrāntipravṛttasya rajata
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tat eva idam rajatam iti śukti viṣaye bhrānti pravṛttasya

original: etadavimarśīkaraṇaṃ śuktiketi rajatamiti ca jñānaṃ rajatasyonmūlanaṃ
analyzed: etat avimarśīkaraṇam śuktikā iti rajatam iti ca jñānam rajatasya unmūlanam

original: pratiṣṭhāṃ pramātari bhajata iti vā thā vicāreṇa vakṣyate ca rajataika
analyzed: pratiṣṭhām pramātari bhajate iti vā vicāreṇa vakṣyate ca

original: vimarśa ityatra vimarśa svabhāve | evaṃ sthite satyapidvicandraṃ parasyāpi

original: pradarśya tasyāpya pūrvavastu darśanākhyaṃ kutūhalaṃ yāvaccikīrṣati
analyzed: pradarśya pūrva vastu darśana ākhyam kutūhalam yāvat cikīrṣati

original: prācyaṃ dvicandrodayamiti parāmarśaṃ nāyaṃ dvicandra iti

original: bhrāntitvaṃ bhavatu | yatra yasminvastuni arthakriyāṃ nānvicchati tatra

original: ayoraśūlāropaṇātmakaṃ dṛṣṭapratyavāye ca paścādapi rājā tasya

original: pramātrā janamataḥ prabhṛti vā pūrva pūrva janmaśatairvā idaṃ

original: yathābhyastastata iti abhyāsāt ratnahemādi svarūpajñaḥ maṇirūpyādivat

analyzed: śamayitum ghaṭa ādiṣu iva ghaṭa ādi niṣṭhe tasmin sāmānya ādau api
pramāṇam pravartate iti etat sādhayitum alaukikam iti akṣapāda ādibhiḥ uktam
pramāṇa svarūpam anustim asmābhiḥ iti śeṣaḥ kriyā saṃbaṃdha ādi
vastu tva samarthana artham eva kevalam pramāṇa svarūpam uktam
eva lokaḥ śrotṛ jana avibhāgaḥ iti bāhya śāstra ukta
viṣaya sukha ādi grahaṇam pramāṇam ekam
bahiṣkaraṇa viṣaya nīla ādi grāhakam pramāṇam ekam lakṣaṇam nāma

carcanam ityādibhiḥ na āyāsitaḥ pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇasya
sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha yat yat jñānam śukti rajata ādi vat abādhita
sthairya tvāt eva apratihata anu vimarśa phalam
vidhatte svayam bodha rūpam bodhya rūpa viṣaya niṣṭham pramātṛ svarūpa

pramātuḥ aidriyake bāhya indriya je jñāne antar karaṇa
viṣaya sukha ādi sva saṃvedane sarvatra vyāpte yogi jñāna

original: - saṃvādameva evatasya visaṃvādo nāsti | avisaṃvādatve hetu māha -

original: svaviṣayabhūtenīlādau sukhādau viśvātmani ca prameya svarūpe ābhāse

original: nirūpayitumāha - tuḥ pratyakṣādanumānasya viśeṣa dyotakaḥ | evaṃ
analyzed: nirūpayitum āha tuḥ pratyakṣāt anumānasya viśeṣa dyotakaḥ evam
bhūtam anumānam pramāṇam iti anumātuḥ pramātuḥ anumāna prāṇa jā
pratītiḥ tu kārya bhūta dhūma ādeḥ ābhāsa antarāt śiṃśapā ādi

original: svabhāvānvā ābhāsāntarān ābhāsāntare agnyādau vṛkṣatvādau ca

original: śaktyupajīvina evāvadhāryaḥ nānyatheti | īśvaraniyati śaktyā vinā na

original: bhavati teneśvaraḥ niyati śaktyupajīvanatvena yāvati deśe kālevā

original: pramāṇaṃ nānyatra deśe kāle vā | āgamastu viṣayarūpa

analyzed: parvataḥ iti evam bhūta vimarśa ātma maya tvāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ api jīvita kalpaḥ

original: vyavahāraḥ | (342) yaduktam yataḥ śabdānuvedhena na vinā

original: pratyayodbhavaḥ iti | tenāgamātmā parāmarśena yadyathā dṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: pratyaya udbhavaḥ iti tena āgama ātmā parāmarśena yat yathā dṛṣṭam

original: tathaiva satyam | tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - yatheti | garuḍa evāhaṃ

vimarśe anukūlyam yaḥ bhajate śāstra rūpaḥ śabdarāśiḥ saḥ api
vimarśavat pramāṇam
atra api dṛṣṭāntam āha jyotiṣṭoma kārī aham svargam
mantā iti asmin vimarśe svarga kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena yajeta iti etat veda vākyam

gāḍha kleśa sahiṣṇuḥ aham buddha padam gantā iti asmin vimarśe
bauddha ānamaḥ yathā ānukūlyam bhajate
gāḍha kleśa sahiṣṇuḥ aham arhat padam prapattā iti asmin vimarśe āha tam

original: śāstraṃ yathā kūlyaṃ bhajate tatra svargādau tasyādhikariṇaḥ viparyayo
analyzed: śāstram yathā kūlyam bhajate tatra svarga ādau tasya adhikariṇaḥ

original: nodeti | svargakāmojyotiṣṭomena yajeteti vidhivākye sati tadvākyā
analyzed: na udeti svarga kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena yajeta iti vidhi vākye sati tad vākyā
śvas tasya eva tatra anuṣṭhāna yogya tvāt evam anya tra api draṣṭavyam

nāntarīyaka tayā sa vahni ābhāsaḥ sa yathāpuras saṃviditaḥ

original: sarvadeśakālagataḥ tathaiva sarvasmindeśe kāle ca nāntarīyakatayā
analyzed: sarva deśa kālagataḥ tathā eva sarvasmin deśe kāle ca nāntarīyaka tayā
saṃviditaḥ iti tatra iti kṛtrime agni ādi śabda vācya tva rūpe

original: divyavasthāpakena pramāṇāṃtareṇa kiṃ na kimapi prayojanamasti | tasya
analyzed: divyavasthāpakena pramāṇa aṃtareṇa kim na kim api prayojanam asti tasya

original: puruṣa samayena niyujyamānasya tasya tasya śabdasya
analyzed: puruṣa samayena niyujyamānasya tasya tasya śabdasya

uktam eva artham vyaktīkaroti etat uktam bhavati ityādinā yasya
kasya cit bhāva ābhāsasya yat kiṃcid kṛtrimam itarat vā ābhāsa antareṇa

tad tad kṛtrima a kṛtrīm ābhāsa an antari ya ka tve kevalam

dhūma kāraṇa tve ca ābhāsamāne niyata rūpam bhūtvā

vahni ādi śabda vācya tva ādau nāntarīyaka tvām iti śeṣaḥ tatas ca niyati
śakti balāt dhūma ābhāsaḥ api agni ābhāsam na vyabhicaret iti

original: bhūto ya ātmā svabhāve bahnyādau sa sarvasvabhāva ekasmādeva

analyzed: kāvye na tu śāstre iti dvitīya tṛtīya pādayoḥ kārya kāraṇa tā uṣṇa tā

nanu dūra adūrayoḥ parokṣa aparokṣayoḥ ca arthaḥ saḥ eva astu
tasya arthasya saḥ eva amayam iti pramātṛ adhyavasita artha kriyā aṃśe
tathā eva iti adhyavasita anurūpeṇa upayogāt bāhya antara tva ādau iti yat eva
bahi dṛṣṭam tat eva antar aham ullikhāmi iti uktam bhavatā
tat katham āntarasya vastunaḥ pramātṛ adhyavasitāyām udakā
haraṇa ādi rūpām iti bhrāntim bhaṅktum āha arthānām arthakriyā api
sahajā na bhavati

original: p. 284) sā īśvarecchāyā niyateti | ayamarthaḥ - imāmarthakriyāṃ karotu
analyzed: sā īśvara icchāyāḥ niyatā iti ayam arthaḥ imām arthakriyām karotu

original: na karotviti niyamitaḥ hi yasmāttena tenārthavargasya tasyārthakriyāyāḥ
analyzed: na karotu iti niyamitaḥ hi yasmāt tena tena artha vargasya tasya artha kriyāyāḥ
akriyātaḥ akaraṇāt anyathātvam na bhavati

original: ghaṭasyodakāharaṇādyarthakriyā bhāve ghaṭatvaṃ na ghaṭa yatitasya
analyzed: ghaṭasya udaka āharaṇa ādi arthakriyā bhāve ghaṭa tvam na ghaṭa yatitasya

kāri tvam iti anena vākyena arthakriyā vibhāvasya svarūpam

original: gaṇitā sā tasya sahajā svarūpabhūtāna bhavati | arthasya bhavane'bhavane
analyzed: gaṇitā sā tasya bhavati arthasya bhavane abhavane

original: ca tatkāritvamiti arthakriyākāritvāmīśvarecchā niyataṃ hiyasmāt | teneti |

analyzed: tasyāḥ arthakriyāyāḥ akriyātaḥ iti akaraṇāt hetoḥ bhāvasya anya tvam

original: | antaratvāt pramātraikya ityatra vakṣyate | jaḍasya tu na sā śaktirityādau

original: śuktirajatamevā patati | idaṃ rajatamiti vimṛśyamānatvāt | tataśceti |

original: p. 285) anyathā paścāt dvicandrāvaruddho na bhavati | dvicandrā varuddha

idam rajatam sthiram sarva pramātra sādhāraṇam

original: idaṃ na rajataṃ sthiraṃ na pramātrantaragamyaṃ nābhimatārthakriyāka---

original: pūrvamidaṃ rajatamiti rajatavimarśakāla eva rajataṃ nā bhūt | tataḥ

yāvatā āpūrṇe na

original: sṛjabhuvanāni yathecchaṃ sthāpayaharatiraya bhāsaya ca || iti |

original: ghaṭādeścaitrādeścānyonya bhedāvabhāso māyā tat pṛṣṭhe māyā

original: tatsamudāyarūpe svalakṣanātmanyabhedane ca bhagavata eva svātantryaṃ

eka aneka ātmaka ghaṭa paṭa ādi vyavahāraḥ api eka aneka ātmaka parameśvara

original: svarūpānu praveśa virodhī na bhavatītyanena pratipāditam | etadeveti -

original: siddhiḥ avasthitiḥ parameśvarāyatteti nirūpayati - guṇairiti | bhāvānāṃ

original: ghaṭaḥ svata eva | saṃścet tasyā sadrūpatvameva tattvamiti

tasya iti pūrva uktasya nitya tva vibhu tva svatantra tva rūpasya aiśvarya
svabhāvasya guru kaṭākṣeṇa prakāśikā yā sā
maya viparyāsa eka lakṣaṇe pāśanīyakāt svatantra paramārthataḥ yaṃ

original: vidaikye'pi sarvasya dṛśyasya draṣṭurdarśanasya ca bhede
analyzed: vid aikye api sarvasya dṛśyasya draṣṭuḥ darśanasya ca bhede

original: dṛśyamanyaddraṣṭā cānyaḥ jñānaṃ cānyat ityanyonya bhede jāte

original: yā śaktiyuktatvāt yo hi jñānakriyā svātantryayuktaḥ sa īśvaraḥ | yathā

original: catvaṃ tasmāt jñānakriyāśaktiyuktatvāt īśvara eveti īśvaratva
analyzed: tasmāt jñāna kriyā śakti yukta tvāt īśvaraḥ eva iti īśvara tva

original: kṛtinaḥ kṛtakṛtyāḥ pūrṇā bhavanti sā anugrahātmikā
analyzed: kṛtinaḥ kṛtakṛtyāḥ pūrṇāḥ bhavanti sā anugraha ātmikā
yat aiśvaryam ātmani nitya tva ādi aiśvaryam uktam tat aiśvarya prakāśikā

yuktīḥ ādṛśya tad yukti āśvasta hṛdayāḥ kṛtinaḥ kṛtakṛtyāḥ pūrṇā

original: pūrvameva | eṣa cānugrahalakṣaṇāḥ antyaḥ pañcamaḥ pārameśvaraḥ
analyzed: pūrvam eva eṣa ca anugraha lakṣaṇāḥ antyaḥ pañcamaḥ pārameśvaraḥ

original: (455) madanyā ghaṭādayaśca tadvat ahamapi caitrādyanyo na maitra eveti

atha
bheda śālinam ātma tvena prathayate viśva uttīrṇam
pūrṇa ahantā ātmakam ātmānam yaḥ prathayate bhaktānām
pratyabhijñāta sva ātma maheśvara samāviṣṭānām
śiva ādi kṣiti anta ananta tatva maya mānam iti mātṛcakram ca
bhaktānām api ātmānam yaḥ ati aikyena prathayate aviratam prakaṭī
karoti yaḥ tam śivam stumaḥ
evam iti ukta prakāreṇa jñāna adhikāra ātmanā sva saṃvedanena
sva anubhavena kriyā adhikāra ātmanā yuktyā parameśvara proktaiḥ āgamaiḥ ca

original: siddhaṃ maheśvararūpaṃ yat vitatyanirṇītaṃ tadeva saṃkṣepeṇa
analyzed: siddham maheśvara rūpam yat vitatya nirṇītam tat eva saṃkṣepeṇa
śiṣya buddhiṣu niveśayitum saṃkṣipya sthāpayitum sva ātmā eva

original: sarvajantūnā utpale nopapāditetyantena ślokāṣṭadaśakayukte nāhnike na
analyzed: utpale na upapāditā iti antena śloka aṣṭadaśaka yukte na āhnike na
tatva artha saṃgraham paramārtha bhūta artha saṃgraham pradarśayati tatra
tatva artha saṃgraha rūpe āhnike śloke pāramārthikam svarūpam uktvā

original: patirevaṃ vidhastasya prameyamevaṃ vidhamiti mātṛmeya darśanadiśā
analyzed: patiḥ evaṃvidhaḥ tasya prameyam evaṃvidham iti mātṛ meya darśana diśā
śloka navakena saṃsāra ātmaka bandha svarūpam saptakena maheśvara ātmaka
sva svarūpa pratyabhijñāna ātmakam moṣa tatvam ślokena tu
sarva jantūnām idam iti jaḍa parāmarśa viśrānti bhūtā aham iti

pūrva ukta nītyā śiva ādi sakala antānām pramātṝṇām maheśvaraḥ eva

original: svātmā teṣāṃ svātmaiva maheśvaraḥ sa caika eva deśakālākalita
analyzed: sva ātmā teṣām sva ātmā eva maheśvaraḥ sa ca ekaḥ eva deśa kāla ākalita

original: saṃvit svarūpatvād eka evā dvitīya eva | idantāmantarnītāṃ kṛtvā

aham iti akhaṇḍa āmarśa bṛṃhitaḥ evam rūpe sva ātmani svātantryeṇa
vaiśvara rūpa pradarśanāt śiva ādi kṣiti anta viśva rūpaḥ

original: jagati ghaṭapaṭādayo jaḍāstāvaccetana nimagnā eva bhānti |
